fields.title: Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas
fields.description: Hunter S. Thompson's iconic book that explores the counterculture of the 1960s through a wild, drug-fueled road trip.

fields.title: The Rum Diary
fields.description: Hunter S. Thompson's semi-autobiographical novel about a journalist's adventures in Puerto Rico.

fields.title: Dune
fields.description: Frank Herbert's epic science fiction novel that explores politics, religion, and ecology on the desert planet of Arrakis.

fields.title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
fields.description: J.K. Rowling's magical first book in the Harry Potter series, where a young boy discovers he is a wizard.
